b'Asu wo Tsukutta Otoko: Tanabe Sakurou: b"A fusion of live action and animation to tell the story of Lake Biwa's draining.\n\nLake Biwa Canal has been an economic life giver to Kyoto. Its formation is all due to a young engineer by the name Tanabe Sakuro who tried to incorporate an idealistic and new technology of the time: hydroelectric power. He was able to build Japan's first hydro-electric power station through the construction of the canal (which obviously required the lake the be drained, hence the title of the anime)."
